Class OrderedPortionsDao

java.lang.Object

IOrderedPortionsDao
public class OrderedPortionsDao
extends java.lang.Object

Data Access Object for performing CRUD on OrderedPortions table and returning OrderedPortionsEntity -objects when applicable. OrderedPortionsEntity
